overview: From New Sensations, the studio that brought you The Office: A XXX Parody & 30 Rock: A XXX Parody, comes the story of a group of friends that are living the life: getting rich, getting famous, & getting laid. Follow parodies of your favorite characters (Eric, Vince, Turtle, and Drama) on their sex-filled adventures through the hottest pussy in La La Land & all the fun things that cum with it! When Vince's latest film flops, Turtle decides to upload a celebrity sex tape of Vince and everyone's favorite super-starlet-next-door, Mandy Moorehead. Will it revive his blockbuster Hollywood career, or will it lead to a Big role in Aquaman: A XXX Parody?
tagline: You will want to hug one out when you watch ENTOURAGE â€“ A XXX PARODY!
title: Entourage: A XXX Parody
